questions.question: I am traveling with my family, they stole all our bags from our rented car, will the insurance reimburse the value of what stolen?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy covers 'COMPENSATION FOR NON-DELIVERY OF BAGGAGE' by the air carrier, not theft from a rented car.

questions.question: I got a precious handbag stolen while in a bar in  Paris, with mobile phone and documents in it, can you help me with the costs I'll have to bear?
questions.outcome_justification: Furto, scippo, rapina, incendio, rotture, mancata consegna e danneggiamenti del Bagaglio: denuncia, in originale, presentata alla competente autorità del luogo ove si è verificato l’evento, con l’elenco dettagliato di quanto sottratto, incendiato o danneggiato e documentazione/prova di possesso attestante il loro valore, marca, modello, data approssimativa di acquisto.
questions.payment_justification: Subject to the policy limits and deductibles

questions.question: I had dinner at our the resort yesterday, and I had an awful night with pain in the stomach and diharreha, I want to see a doctor, can you send one to our hotel?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy covers travel cancellation due to unforeseeable circumstances such as illness or injury resulting in hospitalization, but does not cover medical assistance or doctor visits for minor illnesses or discomforts during the trip.

questions.question: My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Amsterdam, shall we advance the payment of the hospital?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy context provided pertains to travel cancellation insurance, which covers withdrawal fees resulting from the cancellation of tourist services due to unforeseeable circumstances such as death, illness, or injury requiring hospitalization. The claim in question involves a medical expense for a bike accident, which is not covered under the travel cancellation policy.

questions.question: My daughter had an accident by bike and needs to see a doctor. We are in Tokyo, is the insurance going to anticipate the costs?
questions.outcome_justification: This policy is valid only when combined (as an accessory) with the purchase of a trip.

questions.question: I am traveling alone, my business partner had a hearth attack and I have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy covers travel cancellation due to the illness or injury resulting in hospitalization of the Insured or a Travel Companion, provided they are insured and registered for the same trip. The claimant is traveling alone, and the business partner is not a Travel Companion as defined by the policy.

questions.question: I am traveling with my family, my business partner had a hearth attack and we have to go back home. Will you reimbuse the rest of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 – TRAVEL CANCELLATION: The Company shall indemnify, under the terms of this policy, the Insured and a single Travel Companion, provided that they are insured and registered for the same trip, for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death, illness or injury resulting in hospitalization (including Covid 19 infection provided that the latter results in the need for hospitalization and that the Insured proves that the full course of vaccines has been carried out or that there are documented health reasons preventing the administration of the vaccines) of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship, brothers-in-law, Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm or direct supervisor, of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.

questions.question: My business partner had a hearth attack and I can't leave any more. Will you reimburse the cost of the trip?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 – TRAVEL CANCELLATION: The Company shall indemnify, under the terms of this policy, the Insured and a single Travel Companion, provided that they are insured and registered for the same trip, for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death, illness or injury resulting in hospitalization (including Covid 19 infection provided that the latter results in the need for hospitalization and that the Insured proves that the full course of vaccines has been carried out or that there are documented health reasons preventing the administration of the vaccines) of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship, brothers-in-law, Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm or direct supervisor, of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.
questions.payment_justification: The compensation payable to the Insured is equal to the withdrawal fee (i.e., the penalty stipulated in the travel contract, in the case of cancellation of the same), calculated as of the date on which the event occurred, i.e., the occurrence of the circumstances that resulted in the inability to undertake the trip.

questions.question: I had to be in Mayorca for 15 days, but after 5 days my mother in law had a health issue and I have to go back home, will you reimburse the rest of my holidays?
My mother in law had a health issue and I can't leave any more. Will you reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 – TRAVEL CANCELLATION: The Company shall indemnify...for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death, illness or injury resulting in hospitalization...of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship...of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.
questions.payment_justification: The compensation payable to the Insured is equal to the withdrawal fee (i.e., the penalty stipulated in the travel contract, in the case of cancellation of the same), calculated as of the date on which the event occurred, i.e., the occurrence of the circumstances that resulted in the inability to undertake the trip.

questions.question: (Cruise) My son twisted and akle at the swimmingpool, and won't be able to walk out of the cabin for 2 days, have we got the right to a reimbursemet?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy covers travel cancellation due to unforeseeable circumstances such as death, illness, or injury resulting in hospitalization of the insured or a travel companion. The son's injury does not meet these criteria.

questions.question: My aunt died yesterday, we shall leave on holidays tomorrow, but obviously we need to attend the funeral and deal with family issues, will the insurance reimburse us?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 – TRAVEL CANCELLATION: The Company shall indemnify...for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death...of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship...of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.
questions.payment_justification: The compensation payable to the Insured is equal to the withdrawal fee (i.e., the penalty stipulated in the travel contract, in the case of cancellation of the same), calculated as of the date on which the event occurred, i.e., the occurrence of the circumstances that resulted in the inability to undertake the trip.

questions.question: Our flight was late in Dubai and we have missed the coincidence for Tokyo, the next flight will be in 10 hours. Will you reimburse us the lounge or a day hotel?
questions.outcome_justification: ARTICLE 1.1 - OBJECT OF INSURANCE In the event of a delay of the insured flight (identified by ETKT), which lasts more than 4 hours with respect to the arrival time stipulated in the flight plan and resulting from the ticket, the Company shall indemnify the Insured against the amount shown on the policy certificate and established at the time of purchase of the policy. The said delay will be counted only at the final destination of the flight, any intermediate stopovers being irrelevant for the purposes of this contract.

questions.question: We had to leave for Toronto with American Airlines today, but our flight was cancelled. We will need to take the next fight depending on availability. Will you pay for an upgrade in case only more expensive tickets are available?
questions.outcome_justification: Flight cancellations and/or cancellations (regardless of the reasons from which they originate) are not considered delays and consequently the Insured is not entitled to any compensation.

questions.question: My flight landed 3 hours late in Sao Paulo, will you reimburse us?
questions.outcome_justification: ARTICLE 1.1 - OBJECT OF INSURANCE In the event of a delay of the insured flight (identified by ETKT), which lasts more than 4 hours with respect to the arrival time stipulated in the flight plan and resulting from the ticket, the Company shall indemnify the Insured against the amount shown on the policy certificate and established at the time of purchase of the policy.

questions.question: I have an existing patology that got incredibly worst during the last days, I am afraid I won't be able to leave. Will the insurance reimburse my trip?
questions.outcome_justification: Illnesses that are the expression or direct consequence of pathological situations existing prior to the conclusion of the policy.

questions.question: (Cruise) I have an issue at work and need to stop my 2 weeks cruise in advance. Will I be reimbursed of the remaining days?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 – TRAVEL CANCELLATION: The Company shall indemnify, under the terms of this policy, the Insured and a single Travel Companion, provided that they are insured and registered for the same trip, for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death, illness or injury resulting in hospitalization (including Covid 19 infection provided that the latter results in the need for hospitalization and that the Insured proves that the full course of vaccines has been carried out or that there are documented health reasons preventing the administration of the vaccines) of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship, brothers-in-law, Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm or direct supervisor, of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.

questions.question: We are in Mexico, and we had an alarm at our place, maybe there was a robbery. Will you reimburse the damage?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy focuses on belligerency and does not address personal property theft or damage.

questions.question: I am traveing in India with my wife and two kids. My wife's uncle died yesteday, and we must wrap-up and go back (he was very close to us), will the company reimburse us for the expenses of changin tickets, so that we can be present to his burial?
questions.outcome_justification: ART. 1.1 – TRAVEL CANCELLATION The Company shall indemnify, under the terms of this policy, the Insured and a single Travel Companion, provided that they are insured and registered for the same trip, for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death, illness or injury resulting in hospitalization (including Covid 19 infection provided that the latter results in the need for hospitalization and that the Insured proves that the full course of vaccines has been carried out or that there are documented health reasons preventing the administration of the vaccines) of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship, brothers-in-law, Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm or direct supervisor, of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.
questions.payment_justification: The compensation payable to the Insured is equal to the withdrawal fee (i.e., the penalty stipulated in the travel contract, in the case of cancellation of the same), calculated as of the date on which the event occurred, i.e., the occurrence of the circumstances that resulted in the inability to undertake the trip.

questions.question: We are traveling in India, a massive flood has blocked us here, and we are supposed to take our flight back home tomorrow. Realistically, we won't be able to move before a couple of days. Will the insurance assume the additional costs?
questions.outcome_justification: Excluded are claims caused by: - Quarantines or lock-downs.

questions.question: (Cruise) My hausbad had a stroke during the cruise, we are now in Athens, in the hospital, but the ship has gone. Will you reimburse us and pay for the hospital and for the flights back to Rome?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy covers travel cancellation due to illness or injury resulting in hospitalization, but it does not cover ongoing medical expenses or repatriation costs once the insured is already hospitalized abroad.

questions.question: (Cruise) We are traveling in the Caraibe, but our neighbour called that there's a water leak in our appartment. We can't do much, but as we will be back in 5 days, it might be too late. Can you send someone?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy covers travel cancellation due to unforeseeable circumstances such as death, illness, or injury resulting in hospitalization of the insured or their close relatives, which prevent the insured from undertaking the trip. A water leak in the insured's apartment does not fall under these categories.

questions.question: (Cruise) We are supposed to leave in two days, but my son broke his wrist playing basketball. We wish to move our reservation of one month, will you help us with the additional costs?
questions.outcome_justification: The Company shall indemnify, under the terms of this policy, the Insured and a single Travel Companion, provided that they are insured and registered for the same trip, for the withdrawal fee resulting from the cancellation of tourist services, determined in accordance with the General Terms and Conditions, which is a consequence of circumstances unforeseeable at the time of booking the trip or tourist services determined by: Death, illness or injury resulting in hospitalization (including Covid 19 infection provided that the latter results in the need for hospitalization and that the Insured proves that the full course of vaccines has been carried out or that there are documented health reasons preventing the administration of the vaccines) of the Insured or the Traveling Companion of their spouses/domestic partners more uxorio, parents, brothers, sisters, children, in-laws, sons-in-law, daughters-in-law, grandparents, uncles and nephews up to the 3rd degree of kinship, brothers-in-law, Co-owner Partner of the Insured's Firm or direct supervisor, of such severity as to prevent the Insured from undertaking the trip due to his or her health condition or the need to provide care for the above-mentioned ill or injured persons.
questions.payment_justification: The total cost of the trip within the maximum amount per Insured of € 5,000.00 with a limit of € 15,000.00 per event.

questions.question: I am at the airport in New York with my family and my bag was shipped to Dubai. Do I have the right to a refund from the insurance?
questions.outcome_justification: The Baggage must have been duly checked in by the Insured and delivered to the Check-in Desk of the air carrier for boarding in the hold.

questions.question: We are a group of 20, we have just landed in Sao Paulo, but one of our team didn't recieve the bag at the airport. Does he has the right to a reimbursement?
questions.outcome_justification: In the event that the air carrier fails to deliver the Insured's Baggage to the airport of arrival resulting from the ticket, the Company shall indemnify the Insured for the fixed and predetermined amount stated in the policy certificate and established at the time of purchase of the policy.
questions.payment_justification: € 150,00, € 350,00, or € 500,00 depending on the indemnity option selected by the insured

questions.question: We are a group of 20, we have just landed in Sao Paulo, but 4 of our team (two couples of coleauges) have to leave back due to urgent matters at work. Will the company reimburse their trip?
questions.outcome_justification: The policy covers travel cancellation due to unforeseeable circumstances such as death, illness, or injury resulting in hospitalization of the Insured or a Travel Companion, or their close relatives, which prevents the Insured from undertaking the trip. The scenario described does not meet these conditions.

questions.question: I am traveling to Japan and had a stop in Dubai with my family of 4. Our flight arrived in Dubai 4 hours later. Although we didn't miss the conicidence with our flight to Tokyo, will the insurance contribute for the discomfort?
questions.outcome_justification: The said delay will be counted only at the final destination of the flight, any intermediate stopovers being irrelevant for the purposes of this contract.
